text: It is a great place. People have fun and socialize with each other.  It's clean and the staff is friendly. Plus we gonna get money!!! Big money that is!!! The diversity is, awesome.  A place for everyone and all is welcome.  We look forward to our regular guest..... yall better come on and get some of money 💰

text: Had a great time. Try the Irish machines in the back.  They were good to me back in early Feb. 2019.

name: Laura Nash
text: It was at one time, my favorite place for relaxation but not so much now. It is a bit quiet there now. I enjoyed the music, the dancing, the old games, the employees talking smack on the mic and just the overall interacting of the employees with players. Also, I use to win a little money from time to time. Now, I can put $200 in the same machine and I'm lucky if it takes me to the "free spins" once. The machines seems to be tight. Perhaps it is the competition of so many other bingo places in the area. At any rate, good luck and much success. Loosen up, I want to come back "Home". I jate travelling those extra six miles, lol.

name: Margret Collie
text: Nice place to go to get away and have a little fun.

name: Keyon Morrow
text: Where winners are madea

name: Brian Spoonire
text: Im not much for Bingo, but they have snacks and drinks and stay open until everyone leaves!!

name: Melanie Breaux
text: Great place to enjoy some ME time. Workers are very nice, folks that sit around you are so friendly and make it so fun to be there. I never felt so welcome by EVERYONE. I wish the pots could be bigger but there are chances to win a few big ones. The games are fast even though some you ask they say no its not too fast lol, but it was exhilarating! The experience and environment alone is worth the 1 1/2 drive! Biggest tip, let them know you are new and everyone will help you learn each game and advise how many you should start with. I'll be back for sure!

name: darnisha jackson
text: This is a good place for wasting time and money. I play bingo a lot, just let me say im not impressed. They have 42 games i think and they pay sometimes 2 and 3 dollars a game. Dont get me started on the progressive games lord you will never hit it because you have to win in so many numbers and i think its rigged because the numbers needed never come out. Scott the owner is a nice guy i guess. In a nut shell its a rip off period you have 25 people playing 42 games and on most games they play 2 or more sheets at a dollar per sheet so lets just say 25p×2 sheets ×42 games = 2,100 and the whole session may pay out $200 boy bye! In a nut shell the people of Chickasaw and Prichard deserve better😒

name: Sherain Kimbrough
text: Lots of fun.

text: My favorite place to go every weekend!!

text: First time going and i must say all of the reviews are absolutely correct!! Ive been playing bingo since i was 12 yrs old and love it! The people are really funny and makes for a very fun and enjoyable atmosphere. The staff are all friendly nice and helpful to new people. I WON A GAME and thoroughly enjoyed myself!!! Glad i found this place and will soon become a regular!!! Thanks Bingo Magic!!!

resp.text: THANK YOU RAVEN!! WE STRIVE TO CREATE A GREAT PLAYER EXPERIENCE AND WE APPRECIATE YOUR REVIEW!! WE LOOK FORWARD TO SEEING YOU AGAIN SOON!!

name: Connie Smith
text: Bingo Magic is not just for the elderly. Friendly and fun staff. Staff is willing to help new players to understand the games. So if you are new to playing check it out, if you're a seasoned player GO!

resp.text: THANK YOU CONNIE!!!

resp.text: John we are so sorry you left without us hearing you out and trying to correct any problems you may have had through this evening. Please call Ms. Judy, General Manager tomorrow at 205 791 1445 to discuss. Thank you.

name: C M
text: Every 1st saturday they have the biggest bingo of the month. I would not recommend beginners here, this is a good for your buck but it is mind twisting to catch on to how the games work. I will not be returning though. I like comfy cozy bingos, this is too complex as far as games, and they allow smoking.

name: Joyce Box
text: Great time. My friend won and I got half. People were great help and good service. I really enjoyed it here.

resp.text: THANK YOU FOR YOUR REVIEW JOYCE!!! SEE YOU SOON!!

name: Judith Bradley
text: Went to Mr.bingo  Monday night. The woman that manages the place was very rude she literally yelled at all customers when the announcer made a mistake by dropping ball before bingo was verified this wasn't the first mistake caller made tonite. The manager said everybody makes mistakes and everyone needs to shut up she then proceeded to say if anyone there could call any better they could submit an application, I thought everyone there were volunteers, at least that's what all the signs say, so if their not volunteers why do they force tipping on paying customers?: I really think the manager needs to be reprimanded and  apologize to all paying customers! I would not give any stars to any employee at me. Bingo tonite, really sucked bad! Her behavior may have cost y'all many customers. Piedmont  Bingo opens next month and we will be taking many customers and friends with us.
